page.title: 03Sindles Farm
page.content: The owners name is Mr Veltom. The farm is a dairy but grows crops to feed the animals. The whole farm has 250 acres. The farm is roughly 200 years old and it used to belong to the Earl of Besborough in Stansted. Mr.Veltom rented it from Stansted for 10 years and then bought it and called it Sindles farm. Four men work on the farm for they have a lot of machines and do not need as many workers. It takes 1 minute to milk one cow by machine and two hours to milk a herd. By hand it takes 10 to 15 minutes to milk one cow. They have a lot of machines on the farm like the milking machine, tractors, combine harvesters. The mower sprayer and digger all go on the back of the tractors.
